name: max-ether
effect: Used on a party Pokémon : Restores PP to full for a selected move.
short_effect: Restores PP to full for one move.

flavor_text.sun-moon: This medicine can fully restore the PP of a single selected move that has been learned by a Pokémon.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: This medicine can fully restore the PP of a single selected move that has been learned by a Pokémon.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: This medicine can be used to fully restore the PP of a single selected move that has been learned by a Pokémon.
